uiLabels.heroTitle: Convierte visitas en clientes mostrando joyas en tiempo real.
uiLabels.heroSubtitle: Las joyerías que lo usan reducen dudas y cierran más ventas online y en tienda.
uiLabels.tryOnInstruction: Coloca tu mano, cuello o muñeca en el centro y captura.
uiLabels.tryChangingFilters: Prueba a cambiar los filtros o el término de búsqueda.
uiLabels.customizationSubtitle: Personaliza cada detalle a tu gusto

categoryPrompts.ring: Simulate a photorealistic virtual try-on: Place this ring accurately on the person's finger. Match lighting, skin tone reflections, and hand posture.
categoryPrompts.necklace: Simulate a photorealistic virtual try-on: Place this necklace naturally around the person's neck. Ensure it rests on the skin/chest with realistic gravity and depth.
categoryPrompts.earring: Simulate a photorealistic virtual try-on: Place this earring on the earlobe. Match ear angle and lighting for a seamless integration.
categoryPrompts.bracelet: Simulate a photorealistic virtual try-on: Fit this bracelet around the wrist. Consider arm posture and realistic metal reflections.
categoryPrompts.watch: Simulate a photorealistic virtual try-on: Place this watch on the wrist. Match the wrist curvature and environment lighting.
categoryPrompts.bolso: Simulate a photorealistic virtual try-on: Place this bag as if being held or worn. Integrate the handle naturally with the person's hand or shoulder. Ensure shadows and perspective match perfectly.
categoryPrompts.camiseta: Simulate a high-end virtual fashion try-on: Replace the person's current upper garment with this t-shirt. Adapt the fabric to the person's body shape, muscle contours, and posture. Ensure realistic wrinkles, fabric texture, and shadows.
categoryPrompts.camisa: Simulate a high-end virtual fashion try-on: Replace the person's current upper garment with this button-down shirt. Ensure the collar, buttons, and fabric drape naturally over the shoulders and torso with professional photography lighting.
